content: I see Mohamed is a good learner, he does his searches and investigation very well. His communication is good and always makes sure he understands the tasks clearly and every detail of the overall project.
I like how fast Mohamed is able to find root causes of issues when bugs appear, and also planning effective solutions.
Thank you, brother, for helping me choose a mini PC üòÑ

Mohamed works professionally. His messages and daily reports are always clear and detailed. From his daily reports, I can tell he works hard and tries to learn as much as possible. He proactively helps his teammates by sharing his knowledge. Also, communication with him is clear. in conclusion, he is doing a great job!
always pays attention to details, always noting instructions and aware to not fail in same mistakes
Thanks for being a great teammate! Best regards. Reza
Thanks for helping me ‚ù§
Congrats on stepping into the TL role and doing it by the book! Let's see what awesome things we can do together. P.S. Your feedback is invaluable!!!
Mohamed has shown remarkable improvements recently. his ability to adapt and deliver quality work consistently has been impressive, and he's becoming someone we can rely on.

Mohamed consistently delivers high-quality work on time, handling complex tasks efficiently.  He manages his workload effectively and makes informed decisions with minimal supervision. Mohamed communicates clearly and keeps the team updated, ensuring smooth collaboration. He takes initiative in solving problems and leads tasks to contribute to team success. Mohamed approaches his work with professionalism, dedication, and a positive attitude.

In the past 3 months I was working with Mohamed on Satoshi project. he proactively finds bugs and discusses them on DS. he is easily reachable during working hours. the way he works is so professional. I like his communication and reports, as they are so clear and full of details. also he is open to helping others when we reach out to him with a question.
Thank you so much for all the help, support, and kind words of encouragement. It truly means a lot as I start my journey in the corporate world.
Thank you for all the work you do on JR Dunn!
stay positive, you are doing great
Keep creating that amazing community, I'm really glad to see your team work together!

Great work on jrdunn!

I want to sincerely thank you for all the help, instructions, and goodwill you have shown in supporting me and training me for the team lead position. I really appreciate your guidance and patience throughout this process.
Thank you so much for your help and for taking the time to clarify things for me

I guess the only thing that Idris needs now is more self-esteem, and that will come with experience.

Idris has done a good job moving into his new team lead role. I can see that he's trying to learn and grow, and I really respect that. He's motivated and wants to improve, and that's always a good sign in a leader.

Absolutely awesome. I'm very lucky to work with Idris, he's just great, polite, concrete, very easy to reach and understand. Everyone had very nice reviewes about him. The quality of the project is very good so far, he's doing an amazing job with CRs and with general dev workflow. He's very easy-going and pro-active, creates great working environment in the team, one of devs told me that I want to start the work when I wake up', and Idris is one of the reasons for that.

Mohammed has done a great job leading his team, creating a collaborative and supportive environment. He has also grown more confident in his new team leader role, adapting well and performing quite good on his first project in this role.

In the past three months, Mohamed has been very good at: Communication: Mohamed has effectively expressed his ideas, expressed concerns when needed, and provided constructive feedback during team discussions. He ensures that everyone involved in the project is also kept informed. Attitude to Change: He has shown a positive attitude towards change, embracing ideas or best practices. Mohamed is open to learning and adapts well, showing flexibility. Reliability: Mohamed is reliable regarding advice and help, being there when it matters. Independence: He has demonstrated strong independence in the last 3 months.
